CustomField.formula: IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && IsCollaborationProgress__c = True, IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c == 0,(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIPartner&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0, (NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDOD&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c), IF(NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIWithDODDPD&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c),null))),Null)
CustomField.label: Collaboration Button Field
